entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Failure in System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.MemorySendReceiveTest.ZeroByteReceive_CompletesWhenDataAvailable #64948
  • PathTooLongException with MemoryMappedView{Accessor,Stream} tests on osx-arm64 release with mono runtime #64947
  • Multiple mono JIT tests are failing on iOSSimulator in outerloop #64945
  • System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests timing out #64944
  • System.Net.Security.Tests timing out #64943
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_SslProtocols_Test #64941
  • MAX_CONNECTION_STRING_LENGTH = 1024 too short for Azure OAuth Token #64940
  • Assertion failed 'isGeneralRegister(reg3)' on R2R_CG2 linux-arm64 outerloop #64936
    7.0.0
  • GCMemoryInfo.MemoryLoadBytes is not implemented on FreeBSD #64935
    Future
  • GCSimulator_63 test failed in outerloop on linux-arm64 #64934
  • StringWriter should override TextWriter.Write(String format, ...) and delegate composite formatting to inner StringBuilder #64932
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] Retry when we fail to get the connection string from chrome #64931
  • OutOfMemoryException in System.IO.Pipelines.Tests.PipeWriterTests.CompleteWithLargeWriteThrows #64930
  • Add MacOS M1 (ARM64) to runtime-extra-platforms leg #64929
  • How to intercept oninitialized and onafterrender in each blazor component ? #64926
  • Enable multi-register intrinsics support for Arm64 #64921
  • range_r work item: fail: Non-success instrumentation exit code: 101, expected: 0 #64920
  • System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests: Assertion failed 'intrinsicId == NI_Vector128_GetElement' #64918
  • [wasm] Interpreter assertion at `src/mono/mono/mini/interp/interp.c:3874`, for `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #64917
  • [wasm] `RuntimeError: null function or function signature mismatch` in `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #64916
  • R2R codegen issue #64910
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64909
    Future
  • C# application referencing /clr:netcore creating its own static instances #64905
  • JIT: Incorrect results for programs in win-x86 release #64904
    7.0.0
  • HttpStress fails to build on Linux, msquic package seems to be outdated #64902
  • Why System.DirectoryServices.Protocols not working on linux? #64900
  • Add String.JoinLines or EnumerableExtensions.JoinLines #64895
  • RegionInfo(4096) behaves differently depending on preceding method calls #64893
  • Assertion failed 'gtOper < GT_COUNT' during 'Assertion prop' #64892
  • Relative Path and x-plat I/O papercuts #64890
  • Test failure System.PrivateUri.Tests.UriCreationOptionsTest.DisableCanonicalization_WorksWithDifferentSchemes #64889
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProviderMetadataTests.GetProviderNames_AssertProperties #64888
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\gc\\misc\\structfp1_3\\structfp1_3.cmd #64887
  • Reopen OpenSSL issue in #44191 #46271 #64886
  • .NET 6 XmlSerializer no longer emits line breaks #64885

Closed

  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.HostOptions.ShutdownTimeout` default value of 5s is too short #63709
    7.0.0
  • Update IDistributedCache to account for nullability #52148
    7.0.0
  • COSE_Sign1 messages (single signer) can be read, validated, and created #32121
    7.0.0
  • What is the update mechanism of timezone? Can tzdata be automatically updated when timezone rules change #64901
  • Support for implicit project #64939
  • Console.ReadLine on Ubuntu in WSL disables echo of characters when cancelled with Ctrl-C #64166
    7.0.0
  • [mono] class-setup-vtable.c:1747, condition `is_ok (error)' not met, function:mono_class_setup_vtable_general, VAR 1 (T) cannot be expanded in this context with 1 instantiations #61244
    6.0.x
  • FileSystemEventArgs.FullPath does not return a fully qualified path #62606
    7.0.0
  • system.globalization.tests.icutests.icushouldbeloaded #64763
    7.0.0
  • sendpacketselement_filestreammultipartmixed_multiplefilestreams_success failing in net6.0 builds #63521
    6.0.x
  • sendpacketselement_filestreamlargeoffset_throws fails with timeout in net6.0 builds #63522
    6.0.x
  • sendpacketselement_filestreamwithoptions_success fails with timeout in net6.0 builds #63523
    6.0.x
  • System.Net.Ping.Functional.Tests: fail: Non-success instrumentation exit code: 1, expected: 0 #64925
  • In-box SymmetricAlgorithm implementations do not check for disposal #64924
  • Crash on macOS related to code signing and third-party JIT compilation #63952
  • Unclear documentation for FileSystemInfo.LinkTarget #62166
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.Tests.Perf_StringBuilder #64751
  • Simple Hello World app exits with 'Invalid runtimeconfig.json' on OSv #63048
  • Ensure we set -ffp-contract=off on GCC #64604
  • VS2022 Blazor debugging with F10/F11 goes into JS minimised code and not my code #64474
    6.0.x
  • Managed HttpListener lets socket close exceptions on kept-alive connections bubble into finalizer thread #63247
    7.0.0
  • ArmArch codegen for empty / simple methods is not optimal #64912
  • Mono problems with double to nuint conversion #64570
  • Code coverage of System.Private.CoreLib is broken #51058
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Extensions.Tests: Assertion failed #61359
  • JIT: Fold constant access to RVA #64613
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'compiler->opts.IsOSR() || ((genInitStkLclCnt > 0) == hasUntrLcl)' #64808
    7.0.0
  • Inject RegexGeneratorAttribute by source generator #63551
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix runtime tests on Android #64950
  • Test and document decision around CFB8 padding #64949
    area-System.Security
  • Fix SymbolixRegexRunner handling of "beginning" #64946
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Build improvements #64938
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • disable GetGCMemoryInfo on FreeBSD #64937
    disabled-test, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: more stringent interference checks in forward sub #64933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix RegionInfo creation when using LOCALE_CUSTOM_UNSPECIFIED LCID #64927
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Improve SSL platform detection #64923
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • Optimize `StringBuilder.Insert`. #64922
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Remove OP_FCONV_TO_U opcode #64914
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [Mono] Fix potential crash when handling image load event. #64911
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-mono, 6.0.3
  • [Mono] Fix potential crash when handling image load event. #64908
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Remove USE_ZLIB=1 and include the sources instead #64907
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • FileSystemWatcher.Linux: handle races while adding child directories. #64906
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix is_byreflike_set on big-endian platforms #64903
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Improve vectorization of String.Split #64899
    community-contribution
  • Do not number partial definitions and `ARGPLACE` nodes #64898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Keep information about CSE defs on assignment nodes #64896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add user-facing docs and samples for NativeAOT #64894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable tests on Debug CoreClr that are already disabled on Checked CoreClr #64891
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Increase default HostOptions.ShutdownTimeout value to 30 seconds #63712
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Preserve existing keys in dictionary #63834
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #64018
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #63816
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.3
  • Add S.S.C.Cose with COSE Sign1 support #64461
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Turn off -ffp-contract on Unix #64847
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Streamline bool.TryParse/Format #64782
    area-System.Runtime
  • Delete ReflectionModule::m_pCreatingAssembly and PEAssembly::m_creator #64865
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Delete unnecessary entries from ApiCompatBaseline.netcoreapp.netstandard.txt #64928
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move one more 20H2 queue to server 2022 #64919
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64200
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64102
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mobile] Add extra HttpClientHandler linker substitution #64852
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, linkable-framework, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [AOT] Use `.short` directive instead of `.hword` #64637
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon #64104
    Servicing-approved, area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix downcast check in Array.CopySlow #64479
    Servicing-approved, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix DateOnly and TimeOnly Formatting using interpolated strings #64460
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Temporarily disable EC file import tests #64414
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Fix Xamarin assembly names in HttpClientHandler #64391
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-ios, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Alpine 3.15 #64304
    area-Meta, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix profiling objectsallocatedbyclass (#63814) #64284
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] make sure OpenSSL is initialized before Tls13Supported code runs #64252
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Make sure that shared memory object name meets the length requiremens #64266
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #64262
    Servicing-approved, arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Update zip extraction to never throw any exceptions when the LastWriteTime update fails #64192
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix OpenSSL 3 reporting an OutOfMemoryException for missing private key #63955
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, community-contribution, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix crash when VS4Mac is debugging VS4Mac arm64 #64086
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix OpenSSL version check in GetAlpnSupport #64032
    area-System.Net.Security, test bug
  • [release/6.0] Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63533
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, community-contribution, 6.0.3
  • Skip System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingWithIPAddressAndBigSize test on Android #64897
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] Update SAN test to account for OpenSSL 3 changes #63951
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Serialize SendPacketsAsync tests #63888
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test bug
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing error after receiving loaded_files = null #63739
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] [source-build][mono] Do not build Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoTargets.Sdk #63701
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Avoiding assert on mono runtime #62816
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.x
  • Turn off flaky RapidJSON optimization on x64 #64851
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Improve backport.yml to only check start of line and instructions for team visibility #64915
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64394
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Explicit test for injecting scoped IServiceProvider (#63225) #64558
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove OP_FCONV_TO_U opcode #64618
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Bump coverlet version #64875
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Improvements for SpanHelpers.IndexOf #64872
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [mobile] Add extra HttpClientHandler linker substitution #64818
    area-System.Net.Http, linkable-framework, size-reduction
  • Normalize returns after optimizing returned indirs #64881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Propagate exception sets for assignments #64882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: clear lvMustInit from dependent locals #64877
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Make the `EventSource` generator incremental et.al. #64579
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Remove S.R.CS.Unsafe and Intrinsify Unsafe #64861
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT ARM64 libraries testing #64373

  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove spin lock from SocketAsyncEventArgs on Windows #64770
    area-System.Net.Sockets, tenet-performance
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Allow SslStream in ConnectCallback #63851
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Enable merging of platform-variant tests #64835
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Clean up several special tests under JIT/Methodical #64837
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix System.Runtime reference versions and several test project names under JIT/Methodical #64839
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improve Directory.Move and DirectoryInfo.MoveTo #63675
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add alignment to mapped field stream #64559
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 6.0.3
  • Reduce the cost of creating a MemoryMappedFile #63790
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Deduplicate project files with the same name in different folders #64841
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Merge release/6.0-maui branch back into release/6.0 #64687
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64648
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64754
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add `runtime-wasm` pipeline #64830
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [Android] Workaround for invalid return value from clock_nanosleep #64679
    os-android, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use ValueStringBuilder to fix allocations in ToString() methods of XdsDateTime and XsdDuration #64868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Update RateLimiter queues on cancellation #64825
    area-System.Threading
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket tests on NodeJS #64330
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fixes of invalid biginteger casting #56710
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Remove condition that forbids promotion of HFAs with CUSTOMLAYOUT flag #64863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE] SHM_NAME_MAX #64752
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO
  • For MultiRegStoreLoc prefer allocating a local def to the same register as src #64857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName alternate design #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0

    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation

  • Add Nullable.GetValueRefOrDefaultRef API #64677
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Process.GetProcessById bugfix #64723
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Use generic `Enum` methods when possible. #64850
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Better default for L3 cache size on win-arm64 and lin-arm64 #64645
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix too wide memory accesses for nullchecks #64683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0

    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196

    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution

  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #64642

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Detect if the SDK is being run on a CI host machine #23795
  • Ship FSharp.Core.xml as part of the F# redistributable payload for the FSI tool. #23793
  • Webdeploy fails | Serving HTML Files with DotNetCore on IIS #23803
  • dotnet new command should work with the Name provided without the need to specify the name option (-n) #23789

Closed

  • dotnet test should escape MSBuild special characters in filter #10423
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1598260 #23796
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23783
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/6.0.x] Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23336
    Servicing-approved, Area-ILLink
  • Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23177
    Area-External, Area-SingleFile
  • Ensure properties are escaped with double quotes #23720
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23604
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • make a parallel sdk build env script for powershell, not just batch #23194
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reverse versions in error message #23748
    Area-Workloads
  • Add property builder helper #23730
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Embed FSharp.Core.nuget package in dotnet SDK #23779
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: Allow Method Calls to follow Property Setters inside Init-Blocks #5727
  • [getters are taking up too many pixels]: [shorthand getters to check private properties and update if null] #5725
  • [Proposal]: Disable CS0436 by default #5528

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Adding Index support to existing library types (redux) #5596
  • [Proposal]: Compound assignment in object initializer and `with` expression #5176
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Design for exhanced refactoring UX #59352
  • Proposed changes to our source distributed NuPkg files #59349
  • Typing <enter> in single-line raw string literal should convert it to multiline. #59347
  • c# formatting constructor spacing not consistent #59338
  • Incorrect IDE0007: Use 'var' instead of explicit type when the type implements multiple instantiations of a generic interface which influence overload resolution #59337
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 ("CompilerServer: server failed [...] Reached end of stream before end of read.") #59336
  • Namespace segments are clickable inside hovers but they lead to nowhere #59335
  • Fade out method calls with [Conditional] when constant is not defined #59334

Closed

  • GetHashCode() quick action does not respect 'var' preferences #40653
    Backlog
  • 'left' and 'right' in generated equality operators should be nullable. #40053
    Backlog
  • Improve IDE0046 to not report when in a else if chain #59135
    Backlog
  • Autocomplete of summary fails when cursor is placed in multiple spots. #54391
    Next
  • Heavy allocation in formatting an unused error message #58165
    17.1
  • Malwarebytes puts nodejs in quarantine and that affects the JavaScript experience in VS2022/2019 #59331
  • Roslyn projects failing to build in source-build bootstrap build #57342
    17.2

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mark more blobs as non-shipping #40050

  • Quarantine ActivityListenersAreCalled #40038

    Test failures
  • MissingMethodException occured when deploying Blazor Server app with 'Trim Unused code' #40033
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ConfirmEmail.cshtml returnUrl not working #40032
  • Web Component - Virtualization - API Modification proposal - ItemsProviderRequest #40031
    Backlog
  • Checkbox always set to checked if using `checked="@(false)"` if Helper function run to set other values first #40026

Closed

  • Add RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39708
    Backlog
  • Kestrel will only bind to an IPEndPoint not an EndPoint #39955
    7.0-preview2
  • EnableAuthenticatorModel shows page even if user was not found #39909
    .NET 7 Planning
  • So, how is this "silent OIDC login" supposed to work? #40022
  • Is there a way to update the user's claims when using OpenID? #40011
  • Receiving 'The feature is not supported' in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Negotiate #40025
  • Virtualize working great - Modal implementation causes exponential lag #39834
  • [Blazor] Concurrency build issues on CI #37483
    7.0-preview2
  • Visual Studio 2022 Blazor project builds and runs successfully but publish fails with System.ArgumentException #38186
    7.0-preview2
  • Support multiple event handlers for the same event on the same element #14365
    7.0-preview2
  • Including a NativeFileReference causes a Blazor error in Release mode #39825
  • Blazor WASM: Possible to pass pointer to JavaScript? #40027
  • Blazor Prerendering for Static Web Apps #40023
  • Ambiguous Routes #38380
    7.0-preview2
  • Customize ValidationMessage classes #38528
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Installing aspnetcore-runtime-6.0.1-win-x64.exe fails to detect IIS on Windows Server 2019 and does not install ASPNetCoreModule. #39988
  • .NET 6 Memory Leak/Issue #38722
    Discussions
  • VS shouldn't offer to scaffold MVC controllers inside Blazor client apps #5539
    Discussions
  • blazor errors without ambiguity #39848

PullRequests

Created

  • Renaming DisableImplicitFromServicesParameters option #40047

Merged

  • Quarantine StartupTimeoutIsApplied in release/6.0 #40037
    area-runtime, auto-merge, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Fix Kestrel support for custom EndPoints #40003
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview2
  • [docs] Modernize steps in project template README #39949

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `28e1da2` to `14aa11d` #40028
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Quarantine ActivityListenersAreCalled in release/6.0 #40039
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add missing returns in EnableAuthenticator #40040
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • [release/6.0] Don't reuse Pipe buffer when body is read #39376

Updated

    area-runtime

entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Slow First Query after project startup #27392

Closed

  • Ef Core 5 - Many to Many Migration - Dictionary Error #27388

  • Globally disable the creation of foreign keys during migrations #27382

    7.0.0

Created

Merged

Updated
